name: replace_row
description: Replace the content of a specific row in the todo list

row.description: The row number to replace (one-based index)

content.description: The new content for the row

name: delete_row
description: Delete a specific row from the todo list

row.description: The row number to delete (one-based index)

name: insert_row
description: Insert a new row at a specific position in the todo list

row.description: The position where to insert the new row (one-based index)

content.description: The content for the new row

name: move_row
description: Move a row to a new position in the todo list

row.description: The row number to move (one-based index)

to.description: The new position for the row (one-based index)

name: rollback_previous_commit
description: Roll back the previous change/commit. Use this when the user wants to undo their last action.

name: create_view
description: Create a new view by applying a regex pattern to the todo.md file and saving the matches to a view file

name.description: The name of the view (will be used as filename without extension)

regex.description: The regex pattern to match against todo.md lines
